column1: commit-latency-avg 	The average commit time in ns for this task. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
commit-latency-max 	The maximum commit time in ns for this task. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
commit-rate 	The average number of commit calls per second. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
commit-total 	The total number of commit calls. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-task-metrics
